content:
Rachel decides to join the protest and fight for justice. She marches with the group and raises her voice against the greed and corruption that has taken hold of the city. As she marches, she feels a sense of camaraderie and unity with the other protesters.

As the protest reaches its climax, the group is met with a line of police officers blocking their path. The group is given the option to disperse or to continue the protest and risk arrest.

Do you:

1. Disperse
2. Continue the protest and risk arrest

Please select one of the above options by typing the corresponding number.
